application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of a basement impact assessment and sustainable drainage strategy plan pursuant to condition 7 of planning permission Ref: 243313HH dated 23.10.2024 'Single storey rear extension; creation of steps to rear/side elevation; front extension with new entrance door; excavation to lower ground floor and creation of front lightwell (following removal of front porch extension and storage); first floor rear extension incorporating Juliet balcony; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension incorporating Juliet balcony, installation of one rooflight to rear roofslope, one to side roofslope and five rooflights to front roofslope; replacement of rear first floor windows; alterations and replacement of windows to first floor front elevation; demolition of outbuilding; and associated internal and external alterations'
